title: Mobile-Based Short-Intensive Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Elementary-Level Basic Mathematical Concepts
context.additional_context: Course focused on practical mathematical problem-solving applicable to workplace tasks for working professionals, optimized for smartphone-based learning activities

learning_goals: Learners can derive relevant mathematical problems with 80% accuracy by analyzing given work scenarios
Learners maintain over 90% participation in minute-based microlearning activities (10 minutes/day) using mobile apps
Learners successfully apply three or more real-life mathematical problem-solving strategies in project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
